name: All hope is lost
description: People start disappearing every night after dark. Disappearances happen all over the world and no one knows how to solve the disappearances. Do you dare to find out what is behind the disappearances?

name: Santa's post office
description: A children's film that tells how the elves work hard at Santa's post office to get all the children's gift wishes delivered to Santa Claus

name: Cats are taking over the world with robots
description: In this movie, cats and robots started working together to get rid of humans. But can humanity still be saved?

name: What is true?
description: This documentary tells about the paranormal phenomena experienced by people around the world. What do you believe in?

name: The lost spaceship
description: In 2022, NASA lost a spaceship and hid the disappearance from the world. The reason for the disappearance was suspected to be the ship's artificial intelligence, because just before it disappeared it had sent strange messages. Do you want to find out what happened to the astronauts?

name: Voluntarily disappeared
description: This document tells the stories of the voluntarily disappeared. Why did they disappear, and do they ever want to be found?

name: Nessa & Sofia
description: A children's film that follows the adventures of two dolls

name: On the other side
description: Ghosts abducted people to the side of the dead. Can the ghosts be stopped before it's too late?
